ASENA_SESSION.description: Qr.Js ile oluşturduğunuz özel session kodu. Type here yours Asena Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. Azerice => az, English => en, Türkçe => tr, Malayalam => ml, Hindi => HI, Indonesia => ID, Español => ES, Portuguese => pt, Russian => ru

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_VIDEO.description: If you likes video you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

ANTİ_LİNK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

AUTO_BİO.description: Duruma otomatik tarih ve zaman eklemek için true yapın. Set true for auto date, time in biography.

FULL_EVA.description: Hesabınızı bir Chatbot'a Çevirin! Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: Herokuda çalışıyorsa true yazın. If it is running in Heroku, type true.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Herokuda API Keyiniz. Heroku API Key.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Mute Mesajı. Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unmute Mesajı. Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Block Mesajı. Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unblock Mesajı. Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: WhatsAsena Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adı. Heroku APP Name.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Gan Style eklentisi için resim bağlantısı yazın. Type image link for Gan Style plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Çevrimiçi görünmek istemiyorsanız true yazın. Type true if you don't want to appear online.

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: Pass This Step! - Bu Bölümü Geçin!

AUTO_REMOVE_FAKE.description: Remove fake number if welcome msg enabled.

CLR_SESSION.description: Enter true to delete old session.

MENTION_MSG.description: Send a reply to who tag you.

MENTION_URL.description: Mention msg link(text if text msg else url)
MENTION_URL.value: Hi am here.(This is a auto reply)

AUTO_MUTE_JID.description: Enter jid for AUTO_MUTE seprated with ,

START_MINUTE.description: Enter start min for mute seprated with ,

START_HOUR.description: Enter start hr for mute seprated with ,

STOP_HOUR.description: Enter stop hr for unmute seprated with ,

STOP_MINUTE.description: Enter stop min for unmute seprated with ,
